page.title: 05MURSTON HOUSING
page.content: { We asked 22 Murston school-children what type of house they live in. 10 children lived in a semi-detached house, 8 children in a detached house and 4 in a terraced house. Nearly everybody lived in a 3 bedroomed house. Most of the new houses have pedestrian ways in front which sometimes have trees and bushes on the grass. Most of the new houses have central heating and no chimney. At the beginning of the century houses were built for local brickworkers out of bricks made in Murston. In 1971 a large estate was built and in 1972 a new school was built for the junior children as the old school became too small. { }
